Package org.jogger.exception

Exception Summary
BadRequestException Signals that a request has invalid input data and that we should respond a 400 Bad Request with the specified message.
ConflictException Signals that there is a conflict in the input data and that we should respond a 409 Conflict status with the specified message.
ForbiddenException Signals that a status 403 should be returned to the user.
NotFoundException Signals that a status 404 should be returned to the user.
UnAuthorizedException Signals that a status 401 should be returned to the user.
UnprocessableEntityException Signals that a status 422 should be returned to the user.
WebApplicationException Base class of all web application related exceptions.
